title: Handle Player 'Mic'd Up' Segment
description: A player agrees to be 'mic'd up' for a game, wearing a microphone to capture on-field audio for a broadcast segment.

tasks.description: Secure the player's consent and equip them with the microphone before the game.
tasks.expected_outcome: The player is properly equipped with the audio equipment.

tasks.description: Monitor the live audio feed during the game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent listens to the audio in real time.

tasks.description: After the game, review the audio and select the best, most broadcast-appropriate clips.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects several interesting and clean audio clips.

tasks.description: Edit the clips into a segment for the post-game show.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the final 'mic'd up' segment.
